p: For the detection of hMPV subtype A and B, a TaqMan probe-based real-time PCR method was used. All protocols utilized the methods of Professor Fouchier RA. The mixtures were processed prior to PCR amplification with the CFX96â„¢ Real-Time PCR Detection System (Bio-Rad Laboratories). The amplification data were collected and analysed with CFX Manager TM Software version 2.0 (Bio-Rad Laboratories, Hercules, USA).
